author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HUMBERTO FORECAST TO REMAIN A POWERFUL MAJOR HURRICANE FOR THE NEXT SEVERAL DAYS... ...EXPECTED TO PRODUCE DANGEROUS SURF ACROSS THE WESTERN ATLANTIC...
summary: ...HUMBERTO FORECAST TO REMAIN A POWERFUL MAJOR HURRICANE FOR THE NEXT SEVERAL DAYS... ...EXPECTED TO PRODUCE DANGEROUS SURF ACROSS THE WESTERN ATLANTIC... As of 11:00 AM AST Sun Sep 28 the center of Humberto was located near 24.6, -64.3 with movement WNW at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 934 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 150 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...HUMBERTO FORECAST TO REMAIN A POWERFUL MAJOR HURRICANE FOR THE NEXT SEVERAL DAYS... ...EXPECTED TO PRODUCE DANGEROUS SURF ACROSS THE WESTERN ATLANTIC... As of 11:00 AM AST Sun Sep 28 the center of Humberto was located near 24.6, -64.3 with movement WNW at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 934 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 150 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Humberto (AT3/AL082025)
